title: Clearings Index of Business for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1875-1929 (2)--Original Data 1919-1938. Data For 1875-1929 Are Based On A 1930 Revision. Data For 1875-1918 Cover Bank Clearings Outside New York City; Data For 1919-1923 Cover Bank Debits In 140 Cities Outside N.Y.C.; Data For 1924-1929 Cover 131 Cities Outside N.Y.C. Data Are Adjusted For Secular Trend And Price Changes On A Three Month Moving Average. Source: Furnished Direct In Mimeograph Form By The Federal Reservee Bank Of New York.

This NBER data series m12020a appears on the NBER website in Chapter 12 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter12.html.

NBER Indicator: m12020a
